Text saved: It is good to know that people can be different. This helps us talk to people without problems. But it is very important to remember something. We should not use stereotypes. Stereotypes are simple and often wrong ideas about a group of people. They are bad for making good business connections. The country we are from can change how we act and think. But many other things are also important. The place we live in is important. The groups we are part of are important. Our age and if we are a man or a woman is important. The company we work for is important. And the things we do in our life are also important. So, we should remember that people can be different. But we should not use this idea to think all people from a country are the same.
